ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have you seen him who turns away
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Have you seen him who turns his back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Prophet), did you see him who turned away (from the Path of Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), have you ever seen the one who has turned away (from guidance),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So did you observe him who turned away?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Did you observe him who turned away (from Islam).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Have you then seen him who turns his back?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Hast thou considered him who turns his back
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Didst thou (O Muhammad) observe him who turned away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have you [Prophet] considered the man who turned away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Observedest thou him who turned away?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Did you see him who turned away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Seest thou one who turns back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Did you (O Muhammad SAW) observe him who turned away (from Islam).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have you considered he who turns his back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Have you considered him who turned away?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Have you seen the one who turned away
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:33] Did you see him who turned away, from faith — that is, [the one who] recanted when he was derided for it. He said, ‘But I fear the punishment of God!’. But when the one deriding him guaranteed him that he would bear God’s chastisement for him, provided that he reverted to his [former] idolatry, and he then gave him a stated sum money, he reverted —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Didst thou (0 Muhammad) observe him who turned away) from spending and giving alms to the poor among the Companions of the Prophet (pbuh)
